metadata.title: CVE-2022-35229 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An authenticated user can create a link with reflected Javascript codeinside it for the discovery page and send it to other users. The payloadcan be executed only with a known CSRF token value of the victim, which ischanged periodically and is difficult to predict.

criterions.comment: zabbix: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
